title: Network Information
body: The Network Information plugin provides access to network data on a device, such as connection type or when the device comes online or offline.
// We just got a connection but we need to wait briefly
// before we determine the connection type. Might need to wait.
// prior to doing any api requests as well.
property will return one of the following connection types:
Returns an observable to watch connection changes
Get notified when the device goes online
Get notified when the device goes offline
